name: SpaceWeatherConditionsfromNOAA
0:
”Alexa, check space condition.”
”What is the solar wind speed?”
”Kp index?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: check space condition
des:
This skill provides access to the space weather summary from the NOAA Space Weather Prediction Center. Four different values can be reported: 
1. Solar Wind Speed
2. Solar Wind Magnetic Fields
3. Noon 10.7cm Radio Flux
4. Planetary K-index

These are some useful predictors for the chance of seeing an Aurora.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
